lead_paragraph: MARTINELLI--Thomas P.,73, passed away May 28. Beloved husband to Marjorie, father to Katherine and Christina, father-in-law to Evan, brother to Ann, grandfather to Henry. Owner of A Clean, Well-Lighted Place gallery. Viewing at Greenwich Village Funeral Home, May 31, 2-5pm and 7-9pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MARTINELLI, THOMAS P.
